name: FriendlyShelly
0:
”Alexa open Friendly Shelly”
”Tell me a joke”
”Tell me my future”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: friendly shelly
des:
Disclaimer: this skill is a prank skill for entertainment purposes only and does not provide the listed functionality.

Shelly is the nicest AI Bot of all your favorite AI's. Ask her to tell your future, or hear about your family, or for her to tell you a joke.

If you want to hear how great you are, then Shelly is for you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
